trans-unit.note: Bullet ordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Open the Mozilla VPN app on your preferred device
trans-unit.target: Aperi le app Mozilla VPN sur tu apparato preferite

trans-unit.note: Bullet ordered list item in a composer block
Bullet ordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Voila! Your device has been automatically added to your VPN list of connected devices
trans-unit.target: Presto! Tu apparato ha essite automaticamente addite al lista de apparatos connectite a tu VPN

trans-unit.note: Bullet ordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Open Mozilla VPN in your chosen desktop or mobile device
trans-unit.target: Aperi Mozilla VPN sur le computator o apparato mobile de tu preferentia

trans-unit.note: Bullet ordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Go to Settings and select “My devices”
trans-unit.target: Va a Parametros e selige “Mi apparatos”

trans-unit.note: Bullet ordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Select the “Trash” icon next to the device you want to remove from your list of connected devices
trans-unit.target: Selige le icone “Corbe a papiro” al latere del apparato que tu vole remover de tu lista de apparatos connectite

trans-unit.source: Follow this quick and simple 3 step guide to add and remove all of your devices easily.
trans-unit.target: Seque iste guida rapide e simple in 3 passos pro adder e remover tote tu apparatos facilemente.

trans-unit.source: How do I add and remove devices?
trans-unit.target: Como pote io adder o remover apparatos?
